title: [SEWING] Making and Dressing Miniature Teddy Bears
description: Making teddy bears has never been more popular! And in this book, Julie Owen presents a charming collection of miniature bears, each less than 5 inches tall. Readers will find step-by-step instructions for 10 different projects, along with a wealth of bear costume ideas for a variety of occasions, including birthdays, Halloween, Valentine's Day and more. All the bears are pictured with color photographs, including a picnic scene that's bound to inspire any bear-lover. Julie K. Owen first became interested in miniature bear making in 1992. In 1996, she launched her own business, The Great British Bear Company, selling gift-boxed miniature bear kits that she designs and produces. She also regularly teaches bear-making workshops.
